objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel with a smooth, neutral-toned surface suitable for high-traffic exhibition spaces. It has a subtle matte finish in light grey, providing contrast to the showcased vehicle and seating areas.

A tall, flat rectangular wall panel with a smooth neutral finish, adorned with a large car brand logo centrally placed and flanked by promotional banners depicting vehicle imagery. The banners have vivid, high-resolution prints with a glossy lamination, creating a professional showroom backdrop.

A vertical side wall panel matching the back wall's smooth neutral finish, featuring horizontal promotional banners with automotive graphics and brand insignia. The surface has a subtle gloss, highlighting the brand colors and complementing the booth aesthetics.

A vertical side wall panel matching the back wall's smooth neutral finish, featuring horizontal promotional banners with automotive graphics and brand insignia. The surface has a subtle gloss, highlighting the brand colors and complementing the booth aesthetics.

A sleek, aerodynamic mid-sized demo vehicle with a glossy red metallic paint finish, tinted windows, streamlined body contours, and polished chrome wheels. The car model features realistic details such as LED headlight elements, black trim accents, and a modern grille design.

A sleek, modern reception desk with minimalist lines, featuring a high-gloss white finish and a subtly curved front panel. The desk includes an integrated ambient LED strip beneath the countertop and a discreet brand emblem centered on the front face.

A small round lounge table with a clear tempered glass top supported by slim brushed metal legs. The table has a minimalist design with a polished finish and an open base structure for a contemporary look.

A comfortable lounge chair with a robust frame, padded seat and back cushions upholstered in dark grey fabric, and curved armrests. The chair legs are finished in matte black metal, offering a modern and inviting seating solution.

A comfortable lounge chair with a robust frame, padded seat and back cushions upholstered in dark grey fabric, and curved armrests. The chair legs are finished in matte black metal, offering a modern and inviting seating solution.

An elevated display stand featuring a sturdy rectangular column supporting a flat top surface. The stand is finished in bright orange matte paint, designed to showcase brochures or automotive accessories with clean edges and durable construction.

A compact overhead spotlight with a cylindrical housing in a warm white finish, containing a focused LED emitter. The fixture has a smooth surface with subtle ventilation fins and an adjustable swivel head.

A flat digital display screen with a slim black bezel and glossy display surface. The screen is designed to showcase promotional images or videos with high-resolution color reproduction and a matte anti-reflective coating.
